Sentencas: AISI 430 stainless steel is used for interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: One of the main problems with this steel is the formation of chromia scales during oxidation at high temperature and thus increasing electrical resistance.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: In order to solve such problems, a protective and conductive coating layer can be applied on interconnects.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: In this study, AISI 430 steel was coated by Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO(2)composite coating.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: To evaluate the oxidation behavior, isothermal and cyclic oxidation tests were used at 800 degrees C. Area specific resistances (ASR) of uncoated and coated samples were also compared as a function of time during oxidation at 800 degrees C. Chemical composition and surface morphology of the samples were examined before and after oxidation by Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM) and X-Ray Diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: In isothermal and cyclic oxidation tests, coated samples showed lower weight gain due to the formation of Ni2P2O7, Ni3P2O8, and NiFe(2)O(4)spinel.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: This spinel prevented outward Cr diffusion, and improved the oxidation resistance of the AISI 430 stainless steel substrate.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: The obtained result by cyclic oxidation revealed that the coated substrates were resistant against cracking and spallation.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: Also, the results showed that the formation of Ni2P2O7, Ni3P2O8, and NiFe(2)O(4)spinel and also the presence of TiO(2)and ZrO(2)caused ASR reduction.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application

Sentencas: ASR of Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2-coated specimens after 300 h of oxidation at 800 oC (14.21 m omega cm(2)) was lower than the uncoated specimens (41.84 m omega m(2)) after the same time of oxidation.
Titulo: Oxidation and electrical behavior of AISI 430 steel coated with Ni-P-TiO2-ZrO2composite for SOFC interconnect application
